title: Heirloom App
desc: Heirloom is a unique mobile app that uses AI to create a personalized “digital legacy.” It connects users with their loved ones by continuing conversations even after they’re gone, based on data from their interactions.

title: Chatcrypt Web Application
desc: Chatcrypt is a secure, anonymous chat app that stores messages temporarily and deletes them daily for privacy. It supports real-time chats, media sharing, and server status monitoring. Built with Node.js, React, and hosted on Render.

title: Gym Management
desc: This system streamlines gym operations with role-based access for Admins, Trainers, and Trainees. It manages class schedules (max 5 per day, 2 hours each) and limits trainees to 10 per class. Features include JWT authentication, booking management, and robust error handling. Built with JavaScript, Express.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose.

title: SecureFile Manager
desc: This is a secure file and user management system with JWT-based authentication. Users can manage accounts, upload and share files, create and organize folders, and access private spaces protected by PINs. The system ensures privacy and control over file operations like renaming, duplicating, and deleting, all through secure API endpoints.
